00022 #include "scrollingpanel.h"

00029 RainbruRPG::Terminal::ScrollingPanel::ScrollingPanel(){
00030   setPhysicalSize( 1, 1 );
00031   setLogicalSize( 1, 1 );
00032 
00033   xOffset=0;
00034   yOffset=0;
00035 }
00036 
00040 RainbruRPG::Terminal::ScrollingPanel::~ScrollingPanel(){
00041 
00042 }
00043 
00049 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ScrollingPanel::setPhysicalSize(int w, int h){
00050   physicalWidth=w;
00051   physicalHeight=h;
00052 
00053 }
00054 
00062 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ScrollingPanel::setLogicalSize(int w, int h){
00063   logicalWidth=w;
00064   if (w<physicalWidth)
00065     w=physicalWidth;
00066 
00067   logicalHeight=h;
00068   if (h<physicalHeight)
00069     h=physicalHeight;
00070 
00071 }
00072 
00078 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ScrollingPanel::goDown(){
00079   int maxYOffset=logicalHeight-physicalHeight;
00080 
00081   yOffset++;
00082   if (yOffset>maxYOffset)
00083     yOffset=maxYOffset;
00084 }
00085 
00091 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ScrollingPanel::goUp(){
00092   yOffset--;
00093   if (yOffset<0)
00094     yOffset=0;
00095 }
00096 
00102 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ScrollingPanel::goRight(){
00103   int maxXOffset=logicalWidth-physicalWidth;
00104 
00105   xOffset++;
00106   if (xOffset>maxXOffset)
00107     xOffset=maxXOffset;
00108 }
00109 
00115 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ScrollingPanel::goLeft(){
00116   xOffset--;
00117   if (xOffset<0)
00118     xOffset=0;
00119 }
